newsitem.title: HONG KONG: Cheung Kong offers 78 residential units.
newsitem.headline: Cheung Kong offers 78 residential units.

text.p: Cheung Kong (Holdings) Ltd said on Friday it will offer 78 units in its Laguna Verda residential development in Kowloon for sale at an average price of HK$8,286 per square foot.
The size of the flats on offer in the development in Hunghom range from 500 to 1,500 square feet per unit.
Registration for potential buyers will be from March 15 to 19. The units will put up for sale on March 22, it said.
Laguna Verde is a joint venture development between Cheung Kong and China Light and Power Co Ltd.
The Phase I development of the project comprises 740 units and is scheldued to be completed by August 1997.
